name: Days Inn Tucson Airport

reviews.text: Despite some of the older reviews for this property my friends and I booked it mainly for the price and the location. The rooms were basic but clean, the linen washed and the beds comfortable. Keep in mind that this isn't a 5 star resort - it's a place to sleep for the night close to the Interstate and the airport at a reasonable price. As a bonus it's also fairly close to Tucson Electric Park for Cactus League games. It's all about convenience and location.
reviews.title: Not a bad hotel but the price fluctuates

reviews.text: On the down side are some Interstate noise and regular train traffic at night (read train whistles here). Aside from that it was pretty quiet. The continental breakfast (basically cereal, coffee, apples) was somewhat unappealing but there is a Waffle House close by. Rates varied (we stayed here at the beginning of our trip and at the end) from $70/night to $100+/night. Make sure to ask for the AAA discount when checking in. We asked the check-in clerk about the difference and was told that the owner/manager sets the room rate depending on demand - if there is an event going on in Tucson the rates will be higher.
reviews.title: Worst hotel experience in my life!! Do not stay here!

reviews.text: Overall it's not a bad spot to call a night - if I was flying into Tucson and needed a place to overnight before heading out I'd probably stay here again.
reviews.title: Fine for the price

reviews.text: This was the worst hotel experience I have ever had, and I have been traveling for work for 15 years. 1) Room was dirty, unvaccuumed, hair on pillows, fecal matter stuck in toilet. 2) No fitted sheet, just a flat over the mattress, would not give me a new pillow or extra sheet. 3) Got bites all over my body, went to my Dr. and he said I had mite bites! Horriblely itchy and kept me up all night. 4) Manager did not return my 3 phone calls, corporate office would not do anything because it is owned by manager. 5) Loud guys out drinking by the pool, after it closed, kept me up late. 6) Dingy location far from everything, front desk very rude.
reviews.title: Good Overall Value

aka: Days Inn Tucson Airport Hotel Tucson
